mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game (room_id, current_player_id, dice_number, question_id, stage, gmt_created, gmt_modified) VALUES (${roomId},${playerId},-1,-1,0,NOW(),NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE game SET current_player_id = ${pid}, dice_number = ${diceNum}, question_id = ${qid}, stage = ${stage} WHERE id = ${id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.roomId FROM (SELECT r.id AS roomId,count(p.id) AS playerNum FROM room as r left OUTER JOIN player as p ON r.id = p.room_id WHERE r.id != -1 GROUP BY r.id HAVING playerNum!=${maxPlayerCount} AND playerNum!=0 ORDER BY playerNum DESC) AS t LIMIT 1
